Variables: Active Fire Points Count (25 km, 50 km, 100 km, and 500 km buffer radii; 0-7 day lags)
Binary Fire indicator (0 for no active fire points in any buffer radii or lag for given point; 1 otherwise)
Summed length of arterial (A) and collector (C) roads within 100, 250, 500, and 1000 m buffer radii, A and C separately and together
